name: Cuddly Kittens
description:
Playful Kenny is calling from all the way up the cat tree. Can you help his brother Kyle get to him as soon as possible while avoiding all the distracting toys strewn along the way?

Seems too easy? For added challenge (and a time bonus reward!) remember to collect the sardine cans on your way up!

🍂  Single room platformer

🍂  Hand-drawn digital art in the Autumn Glow palette

🍂  Relaxed casual gameplay, meant for when you're snuggled up indoors

🍂  Simple controls and map, suitable for everyone

🍂  Characters based on our real kittens (Kyle loves his sardines!)

We made all the art assets and soundtrack in-house for the purpose of this game jam.

Cuddly Kittens is a cute little platformer built for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022) in about 36 hours by 2 people and their 2 kittens (Kenny and Kyle,  both 13 weeks old when we made this game).

The highlight of the gamejam was when our real kittens also got distracted by the toys in the game :D
